name: ngrok
description: A secure tunnels to expose localhost
summary: A tool for those who want to easily and securely expose a web server to the internet and capture all traffic for detailed inspection and replay
features: Expose http and tcp local services
Transmit replay and requests over the tunnel
scenario: When you want to wxpose any http service behind a NAT or firewall to the internet on a public domain
When you want to expose any tcp service behind a NAT or firewall to the internet
When you want to show a website under local development to a collaborator or a customer
